# Exported docs index- [Your First API Call | DeepSeek API Docs](root/index.md) â€” The DeepSeek API uses an API format compatible with OpenAI. By modifying the configuration, you can use the OpenAI SDK or softwares compatible with the OpenAI API to access the DeepSeek API.- [é¦–æ¬¡è°ƒç”¨ API | DeepSeek API Docs](root/zh-cn.md) â€” DeepSeek API ä½¿ç”¨ä¸ OpenAI å…¼å®¹çš„ API æ ¼å¼ï¼Œé€šè¿‡ä¿®æ”¹é…ç½®ï¼Œæ‚¨å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ OpenAI SDK æ¥è®¿é—® DeepSeek APIï¼Œæˆ–ä½¿ç”¨ä¸ OpenAI API å…¼å®¹çš„è½¯ä»¶ã€‚- [Models & Pricing | DeepSeek API Docs](quick_start/pricing.md) â€” The prices listed below are in unites of per 1M tokens. A token, the smallest unit of text that the model recognizes, can be a word, a number, or even a punctuation mark. We will bill based on the total number of input and output tokens by the model.- [The Temperature Parameter | DeepSeek API Docs](quick_start/parameter_settings.md) â€” The default value of temperature is 1.0.- [Token & Token Usage | DeepSeek API Docs](quick_start/token_usage.md) â€” Tokens are the basic units used by models to represent natural language text, and also the units we use for billing. They can be intuitively understood as 'characters' or 'words'. Typically, a Chinese word, an English word, a number, or a symbol is counted as a token.- [Rate Limit | DeepSeek API Docs](quick_start/rate_limit.md) â€” DeepSeek API does NOT constrain user's rate limit. We will try out best to serve every request.- [Error Codes | DeepSeek API Docs](quick_start/error_codes.md) â€” When calling DeepSeek API, you may encounter errors. Visit https://chat.deepseek.com/ and toggle â€œInternet Searchâ€ for real-time answers. ğŸ•’- [ğŸš€ DeepSeek-R1-Lite-Preview is now live: unleashing supercharged reasoning power! | DeepSeek API Docs](news/news1120.md) â€” ğŸ” o1-preview-level performance on AIME & MATH benchmarks.- [DeepSeek-V2.5: A New Open-Source Model Combining General and Coding Capabilities | DeepSeek API Docs](news/news0905.md) â€” Weâ€™ve officially launched DeepSeek-V2.5 â€“ a powerful combination of DeepSeek-V2-0628 and DeepSeek-Coder-V2-0724! This new version not only retains the general conversational capabilities of the Chat model and the robust code processing power of the Coder model but also better ali- [DeepSeek API introduces Context Caching on Disk, cutting prices by an order of magnitude | DeepSeek API Docs](news/news0802.md) â€” In large language model API usage, a significant portion of user inputs tends to be repetitive. For instance, user prompts often include repeated references, and in multi-turn conversations, previous content is frequently re-entered.- [DeepSeek API Upgrade | DeepSeek API Docs](news/news0725.md) â€” Today, the DeepSeek API releases a major update, equipped with new interface features to unlock more potential of the model:- [DeepSeek API | DeepSeek API Docs](api/deepseek-api.md) â€” The DeepSeek API. To use the DeepSeek API, please create an API key first .- [Reasoning Model (deepseek-reasoner) | DeepSeek API Docs](guides/reasoning_model.md) â€” deepseek-reasoner is a reasoning model developed by DeepSeek. Before delivering the final answer, the model first generates a Chain of Thought (CoT) to enhance the accuracy of its responses. Our API provides users with access to the CoT content generated by deepseek-reasoner , en- [Multi-round Conversation | DeepSeek API Docs](guides/multi_round_chat.md) â€” This guide will introduce how to use the DeepSeek /chat/completions API for multi-turn conversations.- [Chat Prefix Completion (Beta) | DeepSeek API Docs](guides/chat_prefix_completion.md) â€” The chat prefix completion follows the Chat Completion API , where users provide an assistant's prefix message for the model to complete the rest of the message.- [FIM Completion (Beta) | DeepSeek API Docs](guides/fim_completion.md) â€” In FIM (Fill In the Middle) completion , users can provide a prefix and a suffix (optional), and the model will complete the content in between. FIM is commonly used for content completionã€code completion.- [JSON Output | DeepSeek API Docs](guides/json_mode.md) â€” In many scenarios, users need the model to output in strict JSON format to achieve structured output, facilitating subsequent parsing.- [Function Calling | DeepSeek API Docs](guides/function_calling.md) â€” Function Calling allows the model to call external tools to enhance its capabilities.- [Context Caching | DeepSeek API Docs](guides/kv_cache.md) â€” The DeepSeek API Context Caching on Disk Technology is enabled by default for all users, allowing them to benefit without needing to modify their code.- [Anthropic API | DeepSeek API Docs](guides/anthropic_api.md) â€” To meet the demand for using the Anthropic API ecosystem, our API has added support for the Anthropic API format. With simple configuration, you can integrate the capabilities of DeepSeek into the Anthropic API ecosystem.- [FAQ | DeepSeek API Docs](root/faq.md) â€” Your recent account activity may have triggered our automated risk control strategy, resulting in the temporary suspension of your access to the account. If you wish to appeal, please fill out this form , and we will process it as soon as possible.- [Change Log | DeepSeek API Docs](root/updates.md) â€” Both deepseek-chat and deepseek-reasoner have been DeepSeek API Docs](zh-cn/faq.md) â€” æ‚¨è´¦å·è¿‘æœŸçš„è¡Œä¸ºå¯èƒ½è§¦å‘äº†æˆ‘ä»¬çš„è‡ªåŠ¨åŒ–é£æ§ç­–ç•¥ï¼Œå¯¼è‡´æˆ‘ä»¬æš‚æ—¶å…³é—­äº†æ‚¨å¯¹è´¦å·çš„è®¿é—®æƒé™ã€‚å¦‚éœ€ç”³è¯‰ï¼Œè¯·å¡«å†™ é—®å· Docs](root/index.md) â€” The DeepSeek API uses an API format compatible with OpenAI. By modifying the configuration, you can use the OpenAI SDK or softwares compatible with the OpenAI API to access the DeepSeek API.- [V3.1-Terminus Comparison Testing | DeepSeek API Docs](guides/comparison_testing.md) â€” As an experimental version, although DeepSeek-V3.2-Exp has been validated for effectiveness on public evaluation sets, it still requires broader and larger-scale testing in real user scenarios to identify potential issues in certain long-tail use cases. To facilitate comparative - [Models & Pricing | DeepSeek API Docs](quick_start/pricing.md) â€” The prices listed below are in unites of per 1M tokens. A token, the smallest unit of text that the model recognizes, can be a word, a number, or even a punctuation mark. We will bill based on the total number of input and output tokens by the model.- [Create Chat Completion | DeepSeek API Docs](api/create-chat-completion.md) â€” Creates a model response for the given chat conversation.- [Create FIM Completion (Beta) | DeepSeek API Docs](api/create-completion.md) â€” The FIM (Fill-In-the-Middle) Completion API. User must set base_url="https://api.deepseek.com/beta" to use this feature.- [Lists Models | DeepSeek API Docs](api/list-models.md) â€” Lists the currently available models, and provides basic information about each one such as the owner and availability. Check Models & Pricing for our currently supported models.- [Get User Balance | DeepSeek API Docs](api/get-user-balance.md) â€” Get user current balance- [Create Chat Completion | DeepSeek API Docs](api/create-chat-completion.md) â€” Creates a model response for the given chat conversation.- [V3.1-Terminus å¯¹æ¯”æµ‹è¯• | DeepSeek API Docs](zh-cn/guides/comparison_testing.md) â€” ä½œä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªå®éªŒæ€§çš„ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼ŒDeepSeek-V3.2-Exp è™½ç„¶å·²ç»åœ¨å…¬å¼€è¯„æµ‹é›†ä¸Šå¾—åˆ°äº†æœ‰æ•ˆæ€§éªŒè¯ï¼Œä½†ä»ç„¶éœ€è¦åœ¨ç”¨æˆ·çš„çœŸå®ä½¿ç”¨åœºæ™¯ä¸­è¿›è¡ŒèŒƒå›´æ›´å¹¿ã€è§„æ¨¡æ›´å¤§çš„æµ‹è¯•ï¼Œä»¥æ’æŸ¥åœ¨æŸäº›é•¿å°¾åœºæ™¯ä¸­å¯èƒ½å­˜åœ¨çš„é—®é¢˜ã€‚ä¸ºæ–¹ä¾¿ç”¨æˆ·è¿›è¡Œå¯¹æ¯”æµ‹è¯•ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬ä¸º V3.1-Terminus ä¸´æ—¶ä¿ç•™äº†é¢å¤–çš„ API è®¿é—®æ¥å£ã€‚- [å¯¹è¯è¡¥å…¨ | DeepSeek API Docs](zh-cn/api/create-chat-completion.md) â€” æ ¹æ®è¾“å…¥çš„ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡ï¼Œæ¥è®©æ¨¡å‹è¡¥å…¨å¯¹è¯å†…å®¹ã€‚- [FIM è¡¥å…¨ï¼ˆBetaï¼‰ | DeepSeek API Docs](zh-cn/api/create-completion.md) â€” FIMï¼ˆFill-In-the-Middleï¼‰è¡¥å…¨ APIã€‚- [åˆ—å‡ºæ¨¡å‹ | DeepSeek API Docs](zh-cn/api/list-models.md) â€” åˆ—å‡ºå¯ç”¨çš„æ¨¡å‹åˆ—è¡¨ï¼Œå¹¶æä¾›ç›¸å…³æ¨¡å‹çš„åŸºæœ¬ä¿¡æ¯ã€‚è¯·å‰å¾€ æ¨¡å‹ & ä»·æ ¼ æŸ¥çœ‹å½“å‰æ”¯æŒçš„æ¨¡å‹åˆ—è¡¨- [æŸ¥è¯¢ä½™é¢ | DeepSeek API Docs](zh-cn/api/get-user-balance.md) â€” æŸ¥è¯¢è´¦å·ä½™é¢- [å¯¹è¯è¡¥å…¨ | DeepSeek API Docs](zh-cn/api/create-chat-completion.md) â€” æ ¹æ®è¾“å…¥çš„ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡ï¼Œæ¥è®©æ¨¡å‹è¡¥å…¨å¯¹è¯å†…å®¹ã€‚
